review_text: SUCH A SWEET BLENDER AND STURDY TOO. I USE IT EVERY DAY. BOUGHT THIS ONE AFTER A PLASTIC CONTAINER ONE BUSTED IN MID STREAM AND BLEW OUT ALL OVER MY NEW KITCHEN AND NEW WINDOWS TOO.. OH WOW.. LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PINK BLENDER. WORTH EVERY PENNY.
summary: LOVE THE PINK LOVE LOVE LOVE
product_name: Cuisinart SPB-7 SmartPower 40-Ounce 7-Speed Electronic Bar Blender, White DISCONTINUED BY MANUFACTURER
